bookBuilder.title: Go tsenya BookBuilder

upload.title: Tsenya dikwalo tsa gago
upload.dragDrop: Gogela o behe faele ya ZIP mo
upload.supportedFormats: E amogelwa: Difaele tsa ZIP tse di nang le dikwalo tsa Word (.docx)
upload.processing: Go dira ka faele ya ZIP...

import.title: Go tsenya go fedile
import.success: Buka ya gago e tsentswe ka katlego!

messages.importTip: üìù Kaelo ya go Tsenya: Fa ditokomane tsa gago tsa Word di na le diteng tse di tswakaneng (melaetsa, tafole ya diteng, tshedimosetso ya mokwadi, jj.), BookBuilder e ka dira dikarolo tse dingwe. Morago ga go tsenya, o ka phimola dikarolo tse o sa di batleng ka bonolo le go fetisa diteng magareng ga Taba ya Pele, Taba e Kgolo, le Taba ya Bofelo jaaka go tlhokagala.
messages.systemPages: Tsebe ya Setlhogo le Ditshwanelo di dirwa ka go itiragalela - tsebe epe ya setlhogo/ditshwanelo e e tsentseng e ne ya tlogela.
messages.languageNote: Ditokomane di tla arolwa ka go dirisa mekgwa ya puo ya {{language}}.
messages.noContent: Ga go na dikarolo tsa diteng tse di bonweng - tsweetswee tlhola faele ya gago ya ZIP.
messages.duplicateSections: Maina a dikarolo a a tshwanang a bonwe: {{sections}}
messages.processingError: Phoso mo go baakanyang faele ya ZIP. Tsweetswee tlhola mokgwa wa faele o leke gape.
messages.emptyZip: Faele ya ZIP e bonala e se na sepe kgotsa ga e na ditokomane tse di tshegetsiwang.
messages.invalidFormat: Mokgwa wa faele o sa siame. Tsweetswee tsenya faele ya ZIP e e nang le ditokomane tsa Word.

classification.title: Sekaseka Karolo ya Ditokomane
classification.subtitle: Gogela dikarolo magareng ga mefuta go rulaganya popego ya buka ya gago
classification.frontMatterDesc: Tsebe ya setlhogo, ditshwanelo tsa mokwadi, tlhomamiso, mafoko a simololo, lenaane la diteng
classification.mainMatterDesc: Dikgaolo, diteng tse dikgolo, didirisiwa tse bohlokwa
classification.backMatterDesc: Phetho, mafoko a bofelo, tlatsetso, bukantswe ya mafoko, tshupiso, ditshupiso

validation.noFile: Tsweetswee tlhopha faele ya ZIP ya go laetsa.
validation.invalidFile: Tsweetswee tlhopha faele ya ZIP e e nepahetseng.
validation.noDocuments: Ga go na ditokomane tsa Word tse di bonweng
validation.selectValidFile: Tsweetswee tlhopha faele ya ZIP e e nepahetseng

bookBuilder.detectedBookStructure: üìö Popego ya Buka e e Bonweng
bookBuilder.dragToReorder: Gogela dikarolo go di rulaganya gape mo mefuteng kgotsa dirisa "FETISA" go fetola dikarolo magareng ga Taba ya Pele/Taba e Kgolo/Taba ya Bofelo
